import React, {Component} from 'react'; import '../style/auth.css'; import {sendLockData} from "../api/SendLockData"; class Lock extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { username: this.props.username }; } clickHandler() { const username = "11"; const person = document.getElementById("person").value; const design = document.getElementById("design").value; const size = document.getElementById("size").value; const message = document.getElementById("message").value; sendLockData(username, person, design, size, message); console.log(person, design, size, message); } render() { return (
